Package GUI.Game.Controllers

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.Game.Controllers.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForestController, ForgeController, InnController, MarketController, VillageController
    public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Parent class of all game controllers. This controller implements the handling of player tab. Also contains data and methods that all of the game controllers need to operate.

    • Method Detail

      • passUserData

        public void passUserData​(java.io.File accountsFile,
                         AccountsHashTable myHashtable,
                         Village myVillage,
                         Mercenary myMercenary)
        This method allows controllers to pass user data between each other.
        Parameters:
        accountsFile - File that is used to store player accounts.
        myHashtable - Hashtable that is stores in player accounts file.
        myVillage - User's village.
        myMercenary - User's mercenary.

      • resetMercenary

        public void resetMercenary()
        Resets mercenary and updated all player tab GUI elements.

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame()
        Saves user's game data to an external file.

      • pressLogOutBtn

        public void pressLogOutBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing log out button. This will change the scene to login scene.

      • disablePlayerButtons

        public void disablePlayerButtons()
        Disables all buttons in player pane. Used when entering combat.

      • enablePlayerButtons

        public void enablePlayerButtons()
        Enables all buttons in player pane. Used when exiting combat.

      • pressHpPotionBtn

        public void pressHpPotionBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing hp potion button in player pane. Makes the player use hp potion and updates all associated GUI elements.

      • pressMpPotionBtn

        public void pressMpPotionBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing mp potion button in player pane. Makes the player use mp potion and updates all associated GUI elements.

      • pressStrengthBtn

        public void pressStrengthBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing strength button in player pane. Makes the player increase their strength stat and updates all associated GUI elements.

      • pressDexterityBtn

        public void pressDexterityBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing dexterity button in player pane. Makes the player increase their dexterity stat and updates all associated GUI elements.

      • pressIntelligenceBtn

        public void pressIntelligenceBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing intelligence button in player pane. Makes the player increase their intelligence stat and updates all associated GUI elements.

      • pressFireballBtn

        public void pressFireballBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing fireball button in player pane. Makes the player upgrade their fireball skill and updates all associated GUI elements.

      • pressFlamestrikeBtn

        public void pressFlamestrikeBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing flamestrike button in player pane. Makes the player upgrade their flamestrike skill and updates all associated GUI elements.

      • pressHealBtn

        public void pressHealBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing heal button in player pane. Makes the player upgrade their heal skill and updates all associated GUI elements.

      • updatePlayer_all

        Updates player name and level in player GUI.

      • updatePlayer_exp

        public void updatePlayer_exp()
        Updates player exp in player GUI. If player is at max exp, it will be stated in exp label.
